DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to monitor the long term safety and efficacy of duloxetine in the treatment of severe pure genuine stress incontinence.
DOC.criteria: Female out patients. Have a diagnosis of pure genuine stress incontinence on urodynamic study performed within 6 months prior to study entry. Use of monoamine oxidase inhibitors within 14 days prior to study entry or at any time during the study. Suffer from severe constipation.
